topic.title: How to Perform Common Review Tasks

ol.li: Make a selection in the document content.
Tap or click the Add comment button from the bottom right corner of the page.
Input a comment in the displayed dialog. Press Comment to commit it into the document.To modify one of your comments, select the comment and press the Change button.

section.title: See the list of all comments or tracked changes from your document:

ol.li: Tap or click the Menu button from the upper left side corner, or swipe from left to right. A side panel is displayed with all the comments and tracked changes.
Tap or click one of the comments or tracked changes to see it highlighted in the document area.
On touch screen devices, swipe from left to right over a comment to activate the Remove and Change buttons. For the tracked changes the list of available actions are: Accept, Reject, and Comment.
To hide the list of comments, tap or click the Menu button, or swipe from right to left.

section.title: Navigate through the comments or tracked changes:

ol.li: Tap or click the left and right arrow buttons () from the bottom of the page.

The current comment or tracked change is highlighted in the document. Also, it is displayed in the left-side Review panel. If the Review panel is not displayed, it is shown in the preview area, located in the lower part of the screen.
